summary: Repopulate Skyrim with the People of Dogs ...
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size=5]Repopulate Skyrim with the People of Dogs[/size][/b][/color] The DLC Dawnguard is required

[b][i]Place dogs wherever you want through Skyrim ...[/i][/b]

Kara (the scrolls vendor), Dar'Khat-Do and her dog, Rika and her wolves, wait to meet you near the Western Watchtower (Whiterun)

[img]https://i.imgur.com/M6Ub8EA.gif[/img]

23 variants (Huskies/German Shepherd/Shibas/Akitas/Dog/Dogs Statues/Spectral Dog)


5 Dogs are following you

18 Dogs stay at the chosen place

Place a dog statue ... The "dog" is walking !! ... Kill him ! … It's a statue !


[color=#00ff00]Optional File: Esp version Française

Miscellaneous File: NO DLC version (11 variants)[/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/xcykCRF.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000][b] HORDES of Dogs[/b][/color]

This mod adds the ability to quickly create hordes of creatures (5, 15, 50, 100 ...MORE ?...ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer !)

To obtain these dogs, simply buy scrolls found with [color=#ff8c00]Kara [/color] and with some Merchants in [color=#ff8c00]Whiterun [/color] (Merchants: [i] Belethor at the Belethor's General Goods, Elrindir at the Drunken Huntsman, Carlotta[/i]) Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into creatures.

In order to find the scrolls at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list when you launch the game.

[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18021908390116616015568626.jpg][img]http://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/02/19//18021908390116616015568626.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b] Cyrodiilian Wolf Companion[/b][/color]

You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one (in my other mods), you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the follower to return at home (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have lost the active Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” or "`" or "~" key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?] Amazing Follower Tweaks [/url], or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) in the Data Files when you launch the game

If problem with the Dialog Box of the followers/ companions (Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss) you can also enter / exit a house or make a fast travel

[color=#ff0000][b] Credits[/b][/color]

[color=#ff0000]HISSSSA [/color] for the Meshes/textures of these dogs in his mod

[url=http://ux.getuploader.com/issssaxmod002/download/4/HS-Dog-Base+v0.2.7z]hs-dog [/url]

[url=http://hissssa.cocolog-nifty.com/blog/]Blog of Hissssa [/url]

[color=#ff0000]Aenkill [/color] for the textures of the different colors of Huskies (Brown,Grey,Alternative Grey,Pale Brown,Dark Brown,Black) in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36021/?] Husky HD Recolor - Bran and Sceolang replacer [/url]("You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me") (+ the team: MangoMonkey "Unique Huskies Patch" and fix for "No Armors" mod; Edg3k tongue texture; Proxe -blenderartists.org- eye texture base).[color=#ff0000] PlagueHush [/color] for the retexture of the mod of Aenkill [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63598/?] Husky 2k Variants - An Automatic Variants Package [/url] "With Aenkill's permission I've repaired the alpha channel holes in the original textures, darkened the glowing white of the husky undercoat to something a little more realistic (and that works better with ENBs)" ("Just give us both credit")

[color=#ff0000]cansu[/color] for the texture of the German Shepherd in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37769//?] GermanShepherd[/url] ("you can use it anyway you like")

The mesh of the new German Shepherd is from [color=#ff8c00] kgleaton01 [/color] in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29810/?] Judah Working Dog [/url]

[color=#ff0000]tumbajamba[/color] for the mesh of the New Armored Husky (« i decided to upload all my unreleased mount models as a modder resources ») in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8978/?] Armored SabreCat Mount [/url]

[color=#ff0000]LorSakyamuni [/color] for the « Statues » of the dogs in the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76524/?] The Witcher 3 Monsters and Animals Resource Pack [/url] (“You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me”,“Pack containing a lot of monsters and animals included in the game The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt. All the original assets belong to [url=http://en.cdprojektred.com/] CD PROJEKT RED [/url] and are distributed with their permission. Feel free to use them, just remember to credit me.”)

[color=#ff0000]Tedix[/color] for « Dar'Khat-Do » in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/12399/?]Dar'Khat-Do [/url] (Merci encore !)

[color=#ff0000]MoRZiLLo and Renamon[/color] for « Rika » in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51573/?] Khajit Female Marriage [/url] (« You can use at your own MOD or whatever you create without my permission.It's totally Free »)

[color=#ff0000] Flatline42[/color] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16296/?] FC Kara the Pathfinder [/url] (“You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me”)

[color=#ff0000]Mihail Romanov[/color] for the Wolves in [url=https://old.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87163] Wolves of Cyrodiil - Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons - wolf) [/url]

Free sounds : [url=http://www.universal-soundbank.com/] universal-soundbank[/url] - [url=http://www.sound-fishing.net/bruitages_animaux.html] Sound Fishing [/url] - [url=http://lasonotheque.org/] lasonotheque [/url] - [url=http://soundbible.com/] soundbible [/url] - [url=http://www.freesfx.co.uk] freesfx [/url] - [url=http://www.xeno-canto.org/]xeno-canto[/url]
